Dune::IndexPair

Dune::IndexPair< TG, TL > Class Template Reference
[ISTL Communication]

#include <indexset.hh>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class TG, class TL>
class Dune::IndexPair< TG, TL >

A pair consisting of a global and local index.

 the type of the global index.
